mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.dict_id , t1.dict_detail_name , t1.dict_detail_value , t1.order_by , t1.validate_state , t1.version , t1.creation_time from sys_dict_detail t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update sys_dict_detail t1 set
t1.dict_id =#{dto.dictId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.dict_detail_name =#{dto.dictDetailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.dict_detail_value =#{dto.dictDetailValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.order_by =#{dto.orderBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.validate_state ='1',
t1.version =#{dto.version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.creation_time =#{dto.creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.select: SELECT k.ID, k.DICT_ID, k.DICT_DETAIL_VALUE, k.DICT_DETAIL_NAME FROM sys_dict_detail k LEFT JOIN sys_dict m ON k.DICT_ID = m.id WHERE m.DICT_CODE = #{code}
